episodes.name: To Me, My X-Men
episodes.overview: Cyclops races to find the source of new anti-mutant technology.

episodes.name: Mutant Liberation Begins
episodes.overview: When Magneto is forced by the UN to stand trial, a group of anti-mutant rioters test his resolve.

guest_stars.character: Gambit / FOH Guard / Male Rioter / Male Judge (voice)
guest_stars.name: A.J. LoCascio

episodes.name: Fire Made Flesh
episodes.overview: The team is propelled into a tragic confrontation with an immortal mad scientist.

guest_stars.character: Jean Grey / The Goblin Queen / Madelyne (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jennifer Hale

episodes.name: Motendo /  Lifedeath (1)
episodes.overview: Jubilee must relive the X-Men's greatest adventures when she's transported into a 16-bit video game.

episodes.name: Remember It
episodes.overview: Team members hit Genosha as UN honorees while a press event risks exposing the team's dirty laundry.

episodes.name: Lifedeath (2)
episodes.overview: Storm is forced to face her worst fears in order to free herself.

episodes.name: Bright Eyes
episodes.overview: The X-Men finds Sentinel inventor Bolivar Trask, realizing they've been played by a mastermind.

episodes.name: Tolerance Is Extinction (1)
episodes.overview: The X-Men must unite to face a new threat.

guest_stars.character: Trish Tilby / Bespectacled Teacher / Female Teacher (voice)
guest_stars.name: Donna Jay Fulks

guest_stars.character: News Anchor / News Pundits / Computer Cube (voice)
guest_stars.name: Rachel Kimsey

episodes.name: Tolerance Is Extinction (2)
episodes.overview: The X-Men work to settle the score before it is too late.

episodes.name: Tolerance Is Extinction (3)
episodes.overview: The X-Men's dream is put to the test as mutant-human relations reach a tipping point.

name: Season 1
overview: Picking up where 'X-Men' left off, the X-Men are in a period of transition, struggling with the loss of Professor X. And while their world is in a strained state of calm when it comes to mutant-human relations—everyone knows that's likely temporary.
